title: Kell Brook to defend IBF welterweight title against Errol Spence Junior in comeback fight
text:
Sport Kell Brook to defend IBF welterweight title against Errol Spence Junior in comeback fight Brook is stepping back down to 147lbs after losing to Gennady Golovkin at middleweight in September to face mandatory challenger Spence Share Brook will defend his world title against Errol Spence Junior (Photo: Getty)   Thank you for subscribing!   
Kell Brook will defend his IBF welterweight title against Errol Spence Junior in his comeback following his first career loss to Gennady Golovkin. 
Brook is stepping back down to 147lbs - against the advice of his promoter Eddie Hearn - after losing to Golovkin at middleweight in September to face mandatory challenger Spence. 
Spence, 27, is unbeaten with a perfect 21-0 record with 18 stoppages, but Brook is confident he can beat the American and keep alive the possibility of a showdown with domestic rival Amir Khan. 
Brook told Hearn he wants Spence next when they spoke on Friday and the Matchroom MD is close to making the fight. Brook has gone against promoter Hearn's advice (Photo: Richard Heathcote) Spence is Brook's mandatory opponent (Photo: Sarah Crabill/Getty) 
Khan has admitted he wants to avenge his defeat to Danny Garcia rather than facing Brook next. 
“They’re both big fights, both big-money fights, but the fight between me and Garcia is something that always hurts me," he said. “I know I could have won that fight. 
"I was beating him and schooling him, until I got hit with a big shot. That was me not thinking and sticking to the gameplan. Khan is leaning towards avenging his defeat to Danny Garcia (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) 
“I know how the training camp for that fight went. I thought the fight was going to be a walk in the park and I didn’t take it seriously. I thought he was the new kid on the block, I thought, ‘Who is this kid?’ 
“It was all one-sided, but then I made that one mistake and got caught. 
“Since that fight, Garcia has improved and I give him credit. I think Garcia is a harder fight than Kell Brook and it’s just that unfinished business I have with him.” poll loading Will Kell Brook beat Errol Spence Junior? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
